name: # Event Target Documentation
description:
### law_policy
gets the policy chosen for a particular law in the scope international organization or country - usage law_policy(<law>)
Requires Data: yes
Input Scopes: country, international_organization
Output Scopes: policy
### parliament_issue
Unknown, add something in code registration
Input Scopes: country, international_organization
Output Scopes: parliament_issue
### parliament_seat
Unknown, add something in code registration
Input Scopes: country, international_organization
Output Scopes: location
### parliament_type
Unknown, add something in code registration
Input Scopes: country, international_organization
Output Scopes: parliament_type
### active_resolution
gets the active resolution of the type specified in the scope international organization or situation - usage active_resolution(<resolution>)
Requires Data: yes
Input Scopes: international_organization, situation
Output Scopes: active_resolution
### cast_vote_in_active_resolution
gets the cast vote in a resolution, returns nothing if the vote isn't explicit - usage cast_vote_in_resolution(<country>)
Requires Data: yes
Input Scopes: active_resolution
### resolution
Unknown, add something in code registration
Input Scopes: active_resolution
Output Scopes: resolution
### resolution_proposer
Unknown, add something in code registration
Input Scopes: active_resolution
Output Scopes: country
### resolution_target
Links to the named parameter (from the select_triggers) in the scope active resolution
Requires Data: yes
Input Scopes: active_resolution
### vote_in_active_resolution
gets the active resolution of the type specified in the scope active resolution - usage vote_in_resolution(<country>)
Requires Data: yes
Input Scopes: active_resolution
### capital
Unknown, add something in code registration
Input Scopes: country, dynasty, province, area

### active_outbreak
gets the active outbreak for a disease in a location or subunit - usage active_outbreak(<disease>)
Requires Data: yes
Input Scopes: location, sub_unit
Output Scopes: disease_outbreak
